website_summaries.verdict: A quality stainless steel watch band that effortlessly adds a touch of class to any Apple Watch face.
pros: An elegant design that works well even in formal settings
cons: Those unaccustomed to removing links may find the process a bit fiddly at first

customer_reviews.title: Paint coming off after 2 days of usage
customer_reviews.text: Received this band 2 days ago. It was easy enough to put on, and it seems to be of decent quality (judging by the weight) However, the black paint is already coming off! (see picture). I was certainly expecting this to last more than 2 days!
customer_reviews.author: TonyV

customer_reviews.title: Band looks like it could be on a Rolex
customer_reviews.text: This man looks like it could be on a Rolex. I love the metal finish. And includes a tool to adjust the links which is a metal instead of one of those cheap plastic tools. It just takes a little bit to figure out how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jdesign

customer_reviews.title: Replaced my band without hesitation after crashing my bike and destroying it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my band around a year ago and trade it on and off with my original Apple Watch band every now and then. the band is a comfortable fit and always looks awesome! Day to day I have many people even compliment my watch asking where I got it and how I like it. Around a month ago I crashed my bike and did the band in for...apart from destroying my watch I beat up the part where it slides into the watch so it wouldn't even fit. I applied for the lifetime warranty and the company didn't even hesitate sending me a new one. Extremely satisfied and love the product! KEEP IT UP JETECH
customer_reviews.author: Jett Gori

customer_reviews.title: Buy the apple provided band or purchase apple care!
customer_reviews.text: I was using them just fine. It lasted for around 2 months without any problems. Some days back, without a hint, the small connector steel rod (shown in the picture) came out and my apple watch fell on hard concrete and shattered to pieces. I don't have apple care so i gotto pay 200$ to get it repaired! I'm sure i had got the connections right since it was done by my friend who has the same band and it lasted two months without any issues. So stick with the apple brand or purchase something better!
customer_reviews.author: Kailash

customer_reviews.title: really great look, amazing value
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about the quality for such a reasonable price. It fits GREAT, and looks really, really good (GREAT) too. For the price this can't be beat. the kit that accompanies it to add and remove links is a little tricky, but i figured it out in a couple minutes and had it sized correctly. I have fairly large wrists and removed one link and it still floats on my wrist a bit... so, unless you have really large wrists, i think you will be more than satisfied with this product. the finish on it is very elegant - same you would get for much more money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incredible band at a very affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing band, hands down! For the money, there is nothing out there that even comes close. Solidly built, attention to detail, and easily adjusted too! The included tool makes link removal a breeze, and if you take your time and follow the instructions, there is no chance of bending or damaging any of the pins. It even comes with 3 spare needles for the tool! If you want to take your Apple Watch up a notch, buy this band - you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: D&Ms Dad

customer_reviews.title: Paint finish fades real quick
customer_reviews.text: It's not been a week since I started using this band and the paint on it has already started wearing off.. I am so pissed coz I had asked a question if this would happen and I was told that it is black through out and does not fade... Look at the picture and judge for your self. And this is in one Week!!! I would definitely like my money back..
customer_reviews.author: Deepak K. Veettil

customer_reviews.title: Attractive band holds watch securely
customer_reviews.text: This elegant looking watch band was easy to install and adjust to length with the pin remover provided with it. I removed all four of the removable links so that the band would fit on my narrow wrist. The clasp is well deigned ad keeps the watch securely on my wrist. I previously had a woven metal band with a magnetic clasp, and the magnet was too weak to keep the watch tightly secured to my wrist. This band is a vast improvement, and it looks stunning, too.
customer_reviews.author: Pitchfixer

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have Apple Watch Band...
customer_reviews.text: Apple Watch just got better. The Milanese band I ordered was slipping often and I wanted something that would stay tight on my wrist. The JETech Watch Band is perfect. Exact fit for my 42mm and easy instructions on removing links to make it fit as needed. For those of you looking for an alternative to the Milanese Mesh that keeps the watch classy and business like - make this watch band your choice. I have not been paid to make this recommendation or given any incentive. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Philly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect match. It's comfortable and functions perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Loving this watchband. Yes, it is a slightly different color than the space grey apple watch sport. But, it has a brushed finish that matches the finish of the watch's case, and the black color matches the watch face. Perfect match. It's comfortable and functions perfectly. The pin pusher gadget that it came with worked great to remove the one link needed to size for my wrist. 6 month warranty and a quality fit and finish. I'll be looking for more products from this manufacturer. Only one expected downside is that the band is heavier than the apple factory silicone band. I was getting very used to the super light smart watch after having dumped my old stupid watch.
customer_reviews.author: Haverhill

customer_reviews.title: Cheapest, worst-quality band I've ever used.  Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: The worst product experience I've ever had on Amazon. I've bought cheap, flimsy stuff before, but this takes the cake. Looked nice at first, but the pin removal tool failed in about 10 seconds and made it difficult to remove pins from the band. Then one of the pins failed to exit the band, and didn't return to its original position either. Fit and finish was atrocious, and the whole thing was a miserable, low-quality experience. The polar opposite of Apple Watch, and not something I'd advise anyone to buy. 0/10 would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent  product, very well made and looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a better band for my Apple watch and this caught my eye not only its price, but how it looks. I am glad to see someone got the link removal tool right. Had other bands in the past that was a disaster shorting the bands because the tool. The added touch with the ability to raise and lower the band while in the tool makes all the difference. Had two links removed and the small adjustments holes setup to my wrist size in 5 minutes. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: WayneF

customer_reviews.title: Would Buy Again with a Couple Caveats
customer_reviews.text: Once I got the band on my wrist I was happy with it. There are a couple issues though. 1- removing and adding links is a pain. A pin removal tool is included but it's still a pain. 2- Attaching and removing the watch is not nearly as smooth as installing the original band. It doesn't slide and lock as precisely. After all that though I do like how it looks on my wrist. It matches the color of the watch and amps up the dressiness of it. Much classier than the original rubber one. Overall I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: You better have some pliers if you want to get it off.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t like this band. Brought for my new 44mm. Looks nice and adds to my dress when at work. It was a little loose and even could slid it off with easy from the watch slide. Then once on your wrist congratulations you now have a permanent fixture of your body. I had to use pliers to get it off my hand. I tryed alot if things to just see if I could do get it off with out anything. But each time I had to use pliers. And even then it took a minute.
customer_reviews.author: Chris!

customer_reviews.title: Solid Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this band for 8 months now and rarely change it out. It's very durable and has a nice weight to it. Does not feel cheap at all. I could see how some may think it's too heavy but I like it. When I first purchased this, I had a problem while adjusting it and one of the main pins on the clasp broke. I called the company, they asked me to send an email with a picture of the problem, and sent me a whole new band. The customer service was excellent. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MarB

customer_reviews.title: Returned!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Apple Watch Series 4 - 44mm. It did not fit. The connection from the band to the watch face was too large and would not slide onto the watch. I tried it several times on both sides of the face and it did not work. On one attempt it got stuck and because it was so tight I had to use pliers to remove it. I guess you get what you pay for. I will say that just by attempting to slide it into the face that it scratched the color off the band so this was not going to last long. I’d look elsewhere in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle S

customer_reviews.title: Don't get how this gets so many good reviews.
customer_reviews.text: The "pin" or the hole that it locks into that serves as the lock for the band is in the wrong place. This makes it hard/impossible to remove the watch band unless the hinge portion of the band moves (hard to do when you're wearing the watch) In my pictures...when the hinge portion of the band (think inside of your wrist) is against your skin...no amount of squeezing on the release will let you get the watch off. Only if you switch the hinge part in (into your wrist) can you get it off. Don't get how this gets so many good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Excellent substitute for the Apple band.
customer_reviews.text: Shipping date was spot on. All of the tools you need to adjust the size was included. Simple process. I was expecting a cheap lightweight band. Not so! It has a nice heaviness to it and the locking clasp gives me assurance that it won’t open up unexpectedly. I’m glad I returned the Apple band. Saved a small fortune, as well. Durability? Well, I just got it so, we’ll see. I gave it 5 stars anyway. I hope that doesn’t come back to haunt me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: The band is nice and heavy and feels like it’s pretty good quality. However, I can’t help but feel that it cheapens the looks of the Apple Watch. This may be a bit subjective though. If you’re into this kind of style, you won’t be disappointed with it. Maybe it would’ve been better if it was gunmetal color instead of straight black. The color of it makes it look like cheap plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Paolo L.

customer_reviews.title: Classy Look
customer_reviews.text: The band itself is very high quality, if there is a downside, to shorten the band you need to remove a link or what you need. A tool is provided wit detailed instructions. I have purchased two of these and will order again when necessary I have never broken one and the only reason I’ve needed two is because the paint rubs off the band when you rub your wrist against something
customer_reviews.author: G Man

customer_reviews.title: Best band yet
customer_reviews.text: This band is perfect. It comes with the pin removal tool and good instructions. The pins remove and insert easily with pushed from the proper direction and the clasp provides three fine adjustment options. It's comfortable, easy to put on and take off, and looks great. I had similar band, a competitor that is very similar in appearance but I could never get a proper fit. It didn't come with the pin removal tools so I had to buy one. One link out and it was too tight. One line in and it was too loose.
customer_reviews.author: Wyoming Bob

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but...
customer_reviews.text: For the first couple of weeks, everything was great. Less than a month later, the black is coming off... still a decent band if you don't mind the differences in color after a very short period of normal wear. Edit: The paint/color is really starting to come off after only a couple of weeks. This is a "no" from me, I can't suggest buying the black version.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: I've seen a couple of negative reviews on this and I'm really not sure why. It looks great. The links are easy to remove and they send along a nifty little tool to help you do it and if you're like me and don't read directions they even send along a replacement pin remover in case you bend the first one like I did. Oops. I really have no complaints and you really can't beat the price, especially when you compare to the price Apple wants to charge and it matches my black sport perfectly. If you are looking for a link band don't hesitate and just buy this one and get it over with! You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: tika1524

customer_reviews.title: Cannot Reccomend. Falls Off
customer_reviews.text: I cannot recommend this product. It’s very loose when connected to the watch. It fell off once, and thankfully it was on a carpet. As you can see in the picture below, it eventually slides out from the side or it will just pop off. I haven’t even owned this for 12hrs yet and see a huge issue in the manufacturing. If you precious your watch, don’t buy this. Every other band I’ve bought do not have this problem. Other than that one big problem, it’s a nice accessory.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great band for the apple watch series 4
customer_reviews.text: Got this as I wanted a nicer band for the watch. Fits great and was pretty easy to adjust the size. Has only snagged arm hair a couple of times so that is a win since I have pretty hairy arms and a lot of these types of bands love pulling it out. This one has been great. The clasp is pretty secure and I've not had any unintended releases of it. Very happy with this one.
customer_reviews.author: PFPulse

customer_reviews.title: If I could give negative stars I would
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, 1 for my son and 1 for me. The finish is wearing through on mine and started to do so within 2/3 days. My son doesn't mind on his, but I wear my watch at business meetings as well so I do care. It looks terrible. I will be looking to purchase a better band elsewhere. But stay AWAY from this one;
customer_reviews.author: ROB n VICKI

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this band feels super solid and durable.... The tool that was included took just a few minutes to make it fit perfectly.... Looks amazing on space gray/black watch I honestly can't complain about anything on this band plus a lifetime warranty! Get this band
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Williams

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Look!  Amazing Value!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the black bracelet to match with my Space Gray Series 4, and the resulting look is absolutely stunning. Adds a whole new elegance to the watch that you just don’t get with the regular sports band. Snugs the wrist just right, so I don’t have to worry about it constantly slipping down my arm like the sports band – yet it’s just as comfortable and lightweight. Overall, it just gives a more premium look and feel to the watch,
customer_reviews.author: KinnyMac

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift. Perfect. He said it ya great. Comfortable. And adds a little class to the Apple Watch. Had to adjust the band and removing the pins was ridiculous. Broke all of the pin pushers or whatever they are called. Finally got them to work. Aside from the tools being junk. Band is great
customer_reviews.author: Emily Dark

customer_reviews.title: Finish wearing off
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and the included link remover worked great. However within 3 days the black finish began to wear off and continues to get worse. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Don O.

customer_reviews.title: Great band, frustrating adjustment process
customer_reviews.text: First step, adjusting the length by removing links was extremely frustrating and I scratched the band doing so. The tool broke twice and only when I used the broken piece without the holder was I able to get the link pins out. Once past that, I really like the band for its fit, easy on / off and the quality look dresses up my watch.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Really good customer service, nice looking band. [was "You get what you pay for"]
customer_reviews.text: Previously I wrote: "The pin that holds the clasp together came out." Without further prompting contacted me to confirm my shipping address and sent me a replacement watch band completely free of charge. I've been using the new band for a while now, and it hasn't gone "boing" and shot the pin into a dark corner, so I'm guessing the original band was just unlucky. Now that it's on my wrist, I do have to say that the band does look quite the part, and complements the stainless steel Apple Watch quite nicely. I've changed my rating from "One Star" to "Four Stars". Jon.
customer_reviews.author: JonBrawn

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: This Apple Watch wrist band seems well made. Removing links and attaching the Apple Watch was very easy. The wrist band feels very comfortable and secure. I wear it while working out and have been enjoying both the look and feel of it. I highly recommend it. The only issue that prevented me from giving it five stars is that the stainless steel material feels a bit lightweight. I would have liked it with a bit heftier.
customer_reviews.author: SamSil

customer_reviews.title: Great band
customer_reviews.text: Honestly my favorite band for the Apple Watch. Since my wrist is on the smaller size, I had to remove most of the removable links. The instructions provided were thorough enough for me to size the band correctly. It’s been almost a year, and some color on the underside metal has started scuffing up. Despite this, it feels great, looks great, and I’m very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, very pleased for the price
customer_reviews.text: The band itself fits and feels nice. Seems secure, unlike others that fell off. My only complaint isn’t about the band itself, it’s about the tool needed to remove links. It’s a solid metal which is nice, but the needle arrived bent and broke on the first link I used. I had to used the small, extra ones that came which was very difficult and time consuming but I did manage to make work eventually. Would have been so simple had the device not arrived bent.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Nice band.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to switch out with my Nike band when I dress nicer. It is easy to put on and take off yet stays on nice and secure when on the watch. It looks nice and hasn’t faded as of yet. It is comfortable and easy to adjust the size. Seems like a great deal at the price offered.
customer_reviews.author: EPD073

customer_reviews.title: Great watch band. Makes your Apple Watch look like a nice timepiece.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this band. I wasn’t expecting it to come with a tool to remove links. I was able to remove 2 links very easily. Looks good with the space grey but not a perfect match (a little darker in color). For the money, I can’t complain. I wore a Movado for years and the band gives my Apple Watch the same look and feel as that watch. This bandlooks very professional compared to the Apple rubber band that comes with the watch. I love that I can switch it out easily. I switch out this band with the rubber band when I workout. It’s like having two watches. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jovan

customer_reviews.title: Tricky  to size properly
customer_reviews.text: Nice-looking band. It takes some trial and error to get it sized correctly. A second person to hold the band in place on the wrist while determining how many links to remove would be helpful. The pin removal device is a bit crude, but works if you are patient. The instruction booklet could have been better written and illustrated. It took about 90 minutes to figure out the instructions and get the band correctly sized. All-in-all, I'm pleased with the result--and especially the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L

customer_reviews.title: Quality band but resizing can be an issue.
customer_reviews.text: This band is stylish and the quality is better than expected considering the cost but the wider than usual links make adjusting more difficult. Taking out 4 links is too tight leaving an impression in my skin, and taking out 3 and it's too loose leaving the watch sliding around unable to take accurate vitals. If your wrist falls in the perfect realm of the two then I'm sure you'd be quite pleased with band but I haven't worn mine since the first day because of these fitment issues.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Vest

customer_reviews.title: Stylish band at a low price
customer_reviews.text: So far so good with this band. It attaches perfectly and very smoothly to my new Apple Watch Series 5. The tool and directions to remove the links was seamless. Probably not a great band for workouts but it certainly looks more stylish than the standard sport band.
customer_reviews.author: Claxen

customer_reviews.title: Great product, heavy feel on the wrist gives it ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, heavy feel on the wrist gives it a feel of high-quality, light burden on the wallet gives it a feel of high-value. Only issue (why only 4 stars) is I notices some paint issues on the part of the band that my wrist sits on while typing/at my desk. Not a huge issue and very undersatandable. For the quality I am very satisfied, the look it's easy a 5 star, only the paint issue makes it not a 5.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Really makes my Apple Watch look good for what ever occasion.
customer_reviews.text: I am in sales with various customers to see through out the day. I like to look professional for them. This Apple Watch band is perfect and it looks great on my space gray watch!!! Very good quality. Easy to put on and remove with easy adjustment links that can be removed for the perfect fit. 5 stars from me!!!
customer_reviews.author: Loving Amazon Prime...

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Definitely as nice as it seems! So far, so good. It hasn’t scratched or pinched me yet, and the links for adjustments are pretty easy to work with. I’m just waiting to work out in it, so I’ll see how well it does. Thinking about buying the silver band to have options since this one is really nice. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Alexa

customer_reviews.title: I found the band to be a great upgrade for my Apple Watch
customer_reviews.text: I read some negative reviews about how poorly constructed this band was, or about it's jagged edges. These comments are simply not true. I found the band to be a great upgrade for my Apple Watch, and well made, especially for the price. I appreciated the included tool to help remove some links in order to make the band fit my wrist.. I really like this watch band. Frankly, it makes it makes my Apple Watch more attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Noe Longoria

customer_reviews.title: Works nice Looks nice!
customer_reviews.text: Matches the Apple Watch stainless model perfectly. Because of my preference for how I like to wear it, it slides mildly on my wrist. I may have to put a felt pad under the strap. The band installed onto the watch without a problem and removed just as easily (only when I pressed the watch release button). It’s got a very 80s retro vibe. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: StanNC La Plume

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend’s Apple Watch and he has never gone back to the boring, original band. He does get minor irritation from the metal sometimes on a very small patch of his wrist. But, he gets tons of compliments and people asking him where he got it. Two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: cbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: Simple and well made. I installed the band in just a few minutes. The included link adjuster let me remove a few pieces to make the band fight tighter. I also appreciate that they have the small adjustment clips near the clasp to really make it a custom fit.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Castro

customer_reviews.title: Lasts less than 5 months in optimal operating conditions
customer_reviews.text: After using the band for 5 months, I am having to buy another (different) band. I liked the functionality and appearance of the band, material was light and sturdy. After adjusting it and removing links, I could not find the best fit for me, either too lose or too tight. It comes with a pin to do small adjustments, great intentions, bad execution. Lastly, the past week it’s been a struggle to unbuckle it, it’s frustrating and even painful (to my fingers) trying to squeeze the release buttons unsuccessfully for several minutes. Until finally decided to tosse it and buy something else
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Band
customer_reviews.text: Every thing about this band is quality. Other metal bands are two and three numbers to buy and this one meets them. Very easy to fit , they include a tool. If you’re not handy, let a jeweler fit you. At this price it is an exceptional bargain .
customer_reviews.author: Kindle CustomerJohn C

customer_reviews.title: Seemed nice at first.
customer_reviews.text: Band looks good out of the box but I had to return it. It was a bit too wide where it attaches and it extends berond the width of the watch. It comes with a little jig for adjusting the length of the band. This involves pushing tiny pins out from between the links. The needle on the jig broke off.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Etra

customer_reviews.title: Works well for 17mm wrists and larger
customer_reviews.text: Beware. if you have a small wrist, this will not work since you can only remove 4 links maximum. The clasping mechanism is OK.... not nearly as nice as the clasp on my Pebble steel. It's a little harder to engage and disengage than my Pebble Steel band. Also, when removing the links, be sure to move the turntable just low enough so it clears the drill bit... otherwise, you won't get your link out because the drill bit gets stopped by the turntable.
customer_reviews.author: Steven T. Kirsch

customer_reviews.title: Band won’t fit a big guy. Solid product otherwise
customer_reviews.text: Add said it would go all the way to an 8+” wrist. Wouldn’t reach even 7”. False advertising, possible wrong item sent . Either way, it was a narrow band almost looked like it was made for a women’s watch. Returning ASAP Update*** Contacted company , they said they would send more links. Never came . On the fair side, it seemed like a very solid band.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Like the look of the metal watch band
customer_reviews.text: The band is super easy to install, and the black metal compliments the black Apple watch perfectly. I have worn it for a couple of months now and it does not show any signs of wear or scratched. Recommend this band to anyone wishing to have a more rugged look.
customer_reviews.author: DarrellC

customer_reviews.title: Great Price and Band fit perfectly into the Watch
customer_reviews.text: Very Easy to remove the Extra Links with included tool, I removed one from each side and the band fit perfectly. This is far better than bands costing twice the money. Although I have only just installed it I have nothing bad to say. The packaging was good, professional looking. Update 4th day wearing the Band and still highly recommend it. ONLY wish they would improve the latch with a second latch that keeps it flush to the band, it does get caught occasional. Over all best band I have tried super easy to adjust and also fit the watch perfectly. Still recommend this if you want a Stainless Band for the stainless apple Watch.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight
customer_reviews.text: The band is surprisingly light on your wrist, which initially made me feel like it felt cheap, but it's been pretty tough so far and looks great. My only complaint is that the adjustment tools that come with it are definitely cheap and prone to breaking. That said, what do you expect at this price point?
customer_reviews.author: HB Mom

customer_reviews.title: Looks sharp!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very pleased with this watch band. I needed to remove two links for it to fit, which was easy since the tool was included. My watch is 42mm space gray, and I ordered the black band. It constrasts the gray very nicely and makes the watch look much more business appropriate. The stock Apple band is very comfortable, but I thought it looked funny when wearing a suit which is why I wanted this band.
customer_reviews.author: ScottM2007

customer_reviews.title: Easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think about the fact that the band may not fit, but JETech did! They included tools and instructions to remove pieces of the band so that it would fit perfectly. I highly recommend this product and also following the instructions to get it to fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Checketts

customer_reviews.title: Worked great.
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to attach to the Apple watch. We had to remove a couple of links, but easy to follow instructions were included. I think it's a little heavy, but my grandson doesn't think so. He is really pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Poor design, difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I had assembly problems and emailed product support and they never responded. I was never confident that the watch band would stay together. Then one end of the band wouldn't stay attached to the watch - I could easily slip it out. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: BigE

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and fashionable but at a price
customer_reviews.text: Very durable but in order for it to fit my wrist correctly, it has to be at a length that pinches into my skin when securing the watch onto my arm. The paint is also scratching off on the bottom due to normal wear and tear but overall a fairly good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inferior Quality
customer_reviews.text: The band did not fit the watch body tightly. The band felt very cheap and flimsy - hollow links, thin material, sharper edges. Very China grade. I returned. Looks like the pic, though. :-)
customer_reviews.author: KrisS

customer_reviews.title: A happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this watchband. I have seven other bands and this is now my favorite. It dresses up my Apple Watch very nicely and appears to be well made. I was particularly happy with the inclusion of a tool enabling me to easily remove links from the band. I have done this with a safety pin many times over the years with my "normal" watches, it is much easier with the proper tools.
customer_reviews.author: Kite man

customer_reviews.title: Great potential, Poor Fit
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this band, but the connectors did not fit into my iwatch well. It felt like would have had to force it so much that I would risk damage to my watch. I have a few other third party bands that fit snuggly, but they did not require force to connect. I am assuming that this may be just a quality control issue, as many others on here seem to really enjoy the band.
customer_reviews.author: MitoMan

customer_reviews.title: good quality good value
customer_reviews.text: I got this band for my SO and he likes it even better than the band he got with his apple watch. It looks very expensive and high quality. Removing links is a bit difficult but other than that we have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: EL

customer_reviews.title: It works great it looks great got tons of compliments
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about a month ago and wanted to get some use out of it before I made a review I heard some people say they fell apart , not my mine..I had no issues removing the pins to adjust the size ...and mine workedf flawlessly.. it works so good I bought one for a friend because he has the same watch i do. The watch band looks / works great with the silver I watch looks like it came right from the factory I've gotten tons of compliments on it people wondering if I bought it that way with ....it's a great band I definitely recommend it if you're in the market
customer_reviews.author: Dman

customer_reviews.title: Kind of thin at the bottom.
customer_reviews.text: Great metal band, price and the look that I prefer. I wish that it was wider all of the way around, were this gets a little thinner than I like at the bottom of the wrist. Men do not like thin bracelets. I wish it was the size of the watch connection all of the way through without the thinning down.
customer_reviews.author: William Ward

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this band
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this band. Looks great with my 42mm Silver Aluminum Case Series 3. It took some time to get the fit right. You have to remove links with the provided tool and then remove retractable pin on clasp (do not use the provided tool for this) to make a finer adjustment. A snug (but not too snug fit) is important if you want accurate heart rate monitoring.
customer_reviews.author: T. Dub

customer_reviews.title: If you like your Iwatch and plan on keeping it, don’t buy this band.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this band June 9th. Here it is the 28th of August (11 weeks later) and the band slips out of the watch. The small plunger buttons on the band do not function anymore and the watch can easily slide off with just casual arm swinging from walking/jogging. Maybe I got a bad band with defective parts.... I leaning toward the plunger buttons have failed due to being made of low quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: K. Biretz

customer_reviews.title: I have NEVER given a bad review and feel that I am an easy going
customer_reviews.text: I have NEVER given a bad review and feel that I am an easy going, open minded buyer. I was so excited to receive the new band. Just trying to remove a link is ridiculously hard... we have 3 broken pieces and were following the directions. It's disappointing because I was very much looking forward to being able to switch this band with my usual sports-style band. I will be contacting the seller and seeing what I can do in terms of receiving my money back. I am so disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Sleek look and great value
customer_reviews.text: First round had a few pins that were a defective but in all honesty that is not the company's fault. Any watchmaker or jeweler has replacements on hand and in this case the company no questions asked just replaced the entire band. Looks great with the watch - I got a black band and have the space gray watch. Comes with all the tools needed for adjustments, and even replacements for the pin tool. Overall great!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best products I have purchased from Amazon in a while! I was not impressed with the OEM band on my Apple Watch... I wanted something that felt more secure... I found it with this band! This band came with true tool to size it to a perfect fit! Wow that impressed me right out of the box! After wearing this on my new watch for the past several months, I had to take time to write the review... HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
customer_reviews.author: Alvin J.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly after I adjusted the links with the provided tool. Finish is not as durable as I would have hoped, but for the price it is excellent. Much heavier and substantial than I was expecting. I would but again!
customer_reviews.author: H Smith

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected Space Gray band
customer_reviews.text: This band is just what I was looking for. The first thing any Apple Watch Sport owner needs to do is upgrade that silicone band, and I think this is one of the nicest, cost-conscious choices out there. The Space Gray color matches the watch great, the band is comfortable, and the link removal tool makes it easy to adjust (no tiny screwdrivers required!). I also bought a leather band, but I find myself wearing this one exclusively, as it's very attractive and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Perdue

customer_reviews.title: Not durable. Broke in 2 days.
customer_reviews.text: The band looks pretty good but that’s about it. Feels cheap and isn’t durable at all. After 2 days it just randomly broke from one end and my watch dropped to the ground. Thankfully there was no damage to the watch otherwise I would have been really pissed. I wish they made it a little more durable. I expected it to last fine for at least a few months. Unfortunately that wasn’t the case. I would recommend buying other bands.
customer_reviews.author: Devang

customer_reviews.title: Professional looking watch band at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had the band for a little over a week or so and I use it daily and I am extremely pleased with it. I work a mix of an office computer job and driving deliveries around and I’ve yet to see any sort of wear on the paint so far. The link removal tool was incredibly easy to figure out and I took out 3 links in no time. My first order of this item got lost in transit somewhere, but I was able to get my money back almost immediately and turned around and rebought it and I am pretty happy I did.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon D

customer_reviews.title: Small scratches but really good looking
customer_reviews.text: It looks very good disguises into a regular watch since I don’t like the square shaped Apple Watch. I only use it when I go out at night or at more formal events. It scratches quite easy but I still think it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Wang

customer_reviews.title: A Stunning, Must Have Apple Watch Band!
customer_reviews.text: I like the JETech Apple replacement watch band because it is the highest rated on Amazon.com, a great price, is Excellent for easy to remove, very comfortable to wear and durability
customer_reviews.author: Willie

customer_reviews.title: Stylish band - Worth a look and buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am happy I found this band series!!! Its a great price and of great quality!!! Wasn't on a scale of 1-10 (10 being difficult) was about a 4 on adjusting the length of the band for use. If you have difficulty with small pieces and tools you may need some help. As for the band I really enjoy it and feels great on the wrist. It has held up some everyday use and just a few scratches.
customer_reviews.author: AFMerc

customer_reviews.title: Loved it for about a week
customer_reviews.text: Got it a month or so ago but just started wearing it for about a week. Looked great when I got it and I've been very careful with it. Today I just happened to turn my hand over and I saw the black is rubbing off. Too bad but it looked great for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Louie

customer_reviews.title: Just too cheap
customer_reviews.text: Very loose on the watch, made it seem cheap. So that’s why I’m sending it back. Fitment on the wrist was good, I like that the clasp has 3 different positions for even more fitment. But just overall too cheap to have on a $400 watch.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: purely ok
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this would be a bit better quality than I've gotten in the past, but so far, I feel like it's purely just ok. The link removing tool worked, but wasn't great. It *doesn't* make a very satisfying click when closing the clasp; instead it just makes sort of a crunching metal sound, that doesn't give you much confidence that it's closed. The bars that slide into the Apple Watch aren't very flush and protrude a noticeable amount on either side. So overall...just ok.
customer_reviews.author: C. Rosa

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot, it's better than the rubber perforated one by far
customer_reviews.text: The best part about it, is that you don't have to adjust the size every time you put it on. And as far as the tool, the people that are complaining, don't know how to use tools, there is nothing wrong with it; ya, it's a bit cheap, but it gets the job done with a little creativity. The bottom line, is I love it and wish I would have got it a year ago.
customer_reviews.author: Viktor K

customer_reviews.title: Apple Watch Bank
customer_reviews.text: Looks very impressive, easy to attach to the Series 4 Apple Watch and it seems like it will last a long time. I'm concerned, however, that the black finish will rub off (it is starting to in one area) as time goes on. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mark P - Carol Stream

customer_reviews.title: Shockingly nice!
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit that the quality of this band far exceeded my expectations. Made large enough to allow for removal of extra links and they even have a professional grade link removal tool included.
customer_reviews.author: PAT17RICK

customer_reviews.title: Easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: This band has modern metal styling and was very easy to resize. It even comes with all the tools to pop out pins and remove links. Includes extra pins as well. Great value for the price. The band is black in color giving it a subtle contrast to the space gray of the watch. Used to wear the Apple watch band on hole 5, took out two links on this band (one on each side) to get the same sizing.
customer_reviews.author: J. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Elegant Band
customer_reviews.text: What a great band! Have had a ton of comments on how nice this band looks on the watch. Being an executive, it dresses up the watch! When off or weekend, switch to a sportier band. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Parkland_C6

customer_reviews.title: it is really good looking and very well made
customer_reviews.text: This is the second watch band I have purchased. The first one was for my series 1 stainless steel watch. I just recently purchased a black series two and wanted a matching band. Pros: it is really good looking and very well made. As long as you follow the directions and use the pin removal tool correctly they links are easy to remove. Cons: I didn't read the directions the first time I bought one of these bands and I broke three of the four replacement pin removal pins before deciding I should read the directions. Make sure to line up the pin and tool exactly and it works well. I would definitely buy this band again.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice band with an actual clasp vs a magnet.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty band with good looks and a nice clasp system. Removing links takes a little bit of work with included link remover, and instructions could be given for replacing the link instead of just how to take them out. However the actual band is very pretty, heavy, and you know the watch is not coming off your wrist unless the force is so great that your watch would probably be damaged in the process. This band reminds me of older Seiko bands with an improved clasp system. It actually requires you to press on 2 tabs to release the catch.
customer_reviews.author: B. Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: WhyPayMore
customer_reviews.text: I've seen a lot of good looking bands for my Apple Watch 3 (42 mm) but this one is the best. Despite being on the heavier side, it works great with my large wrist. It gives the impression of being rich yet it did not break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: PapaGeorge

customer_reviews.title: It's a joke.
customer_reviews.text: All the pins crack trying to remove one link. Heck even tried with a pin at it bend it. Material felt too weak as well. Would not buy this piece. Don't spend your time and money
customer_reviews.author: Johan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit... Stylish... Tools Included... Touch Clasp.. Nice Finish
customer_reviews.text: Awesome band. Comes with everything you need to remove links and get it just right for your wrist size. Great smooth black finish. I've yet to have any of the black finish come off like some reviews and I'm pretty rough on stuff. Snaps right on to the watch and I've never had it try to slide off or the clasp come undone. Very Pleased
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca & Steven

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install on my Apple watch 44mm. Took it a watch guy to get a link removed because I tend to muck things up like that. He liked the band esp. the price point. Looks good and is comfortable. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: J the Skipper

customer_reviews.title: winning at girlfriending ;)
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend and he loves it. Wears it when we get dressed up for dinner or a wedding. Allows him to wear his Apple watch to events without it looking actually looking like an Apple watch. Good quality, nice weight, included a tool to add or remove links at home (which was supper easy) and the clasp is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS BAND
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS BAND. You cannot beat the price. I have small wrists so I had to get my boyfriend to take out like 5 links, but it fits perfectly. It comes with a cool little tool to take out links. And it looks AWESOME. I got the black one and it looks RAD with the Apple Watch. I have the 3rd gen Apple Watch and it fits it great. I couldn’t be happier with this product and the price. Honestly, even if it breaks in a couple of months it would be worth it and I would buy a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Gould

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality!
customer_reviews.text: Complete junk. Broke before I even got it on my watch. Very poorly made. Super cheap and paint chips easily. Worth maybe $5 at a flea market. I would look somewhere else for a more quality watch band.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Apple watch band
customer_reviews.text: the bracelet fits good adjusts easily, one month later the black coating is coming from the bracelet and revealing the white metal beneath. I know it costs $16, but it shouldn't happen after only one month of ware.
customer_reviews.author: Dalmak

customer_reviews.title: Best fitting bracelet style band I have owned
customer_reviews.text: This a very comfortable and attractive watchband. The best thing about it is the ability to make small adjustments in sizing so that it will fit perfectly. It is very light, which I like. My only concern is whether it will hold up over time. But so far, one of my favorite apple watch bands, and I have owned several.
customer_reviews.author: rayman

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Easy Apple Band
customer_reviews.text: The band has a great feel to it, in fact its the only one I have been using. It was very easy to adjust. It comes off with no problem. So if you are looking for a great Apple Watch, this is the one to get. Anyway, GET it NOW
customer_reviews.author: Norm W.

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional watch band; easy to adjust fit with included tool and a little patience.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent watch band for my Series 1 Stainless Steel silver Apple Watch. It matches my watch perfectly and looks fantastic. It looks and wears like a 1st party Apple Watch band for a fraction of the price. The tool works perfectly if you take your time and adjust it to precisely poke through the link hole. Push the pin through just enough to use a pair of needle-nose pliers to pull the pin the rest of the way through. Make sure to push the pins out and back in following the arrows on the removable links. A backwards-inserted pin is very difficult to remove. TAKE YOUR TIME; patience pays off and this exceptional watch band will fit perfectly. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, excellent Apple Watch band
customer_reviews.text: If you have an Apple Watch and want a regular well fitting band this is the one. The included tool makes adjusting the band simple and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Inner Strength Counseling

product_meta.title: JETech Replacement Band for Apple Watch 42mm and 44mm Series 1 2 3 4 5, Stainless Steel, Black
feature_bullets: Apple Watch band with metal clasp, compatible with Apple Watch 42mm and 44mm Series 1/2/3/4/5
Made of stainless steel metal, which enhances the durability of the watch band
Metal Folding Clasp Design make it easy to wear

The length range of the Apple Watch Bands is 5.7inch~8.7inch (145mm~220mm); there are 3 clasps on each side available to adjust. Using the link removal tool（included in the box）to remove/add links by yourself to fit your wrist
Package includes: 1*Stainless Steel Apple Watch Band, 1*Link Removal tool, 3*Pin Pusher Pins, Instruction manual, customer service card

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars12,914 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
